content.detailedDescription:
Late at night on july 14/15, 1996 at around 2 or 3 in the morning, i was driving with a relative on hwy 90 between del rio and alpine. we were in the general area of langtry, a ghost town, when we saw large circles of light on the hillsides, as though a floodlight or spotlight were shining down on them. we thought surely a helicopter was doing it, but the lights didn't shake or vibrate slightly as they would if it were a helicopter, but moved smoothly. we also could hear no sound whatsoever, and it was very much an aerial source, this couldn't have been done from the below the hills. there was nothing in the air that we could see, though. there was also no ground source. this is very confusing and bewildering as this area is also not easily wired for that kind of electricity, it is practically wilderness for a couple of hours (driving) in either direction. this was on the north side of the road, btw. about a mile or few from this, there is a campsite on the river, but not on this side of the road. this is also quite a deserted road at this time of night. i can also think of no reason for anyone to want to shine lights on these hillsides at night. that is very confusing. 

i know it is far too late to investigate this, but i thought perhaps if someone had reported something else similar or strange in that area, my story might contribute to the information they put forth. 

to clarify, these weren't marfa type lights, this is the light you see on the ground when you shine light on it, like through a flashlight, but much larger - like a spot light.  the lights did move, they weren't stationary as with a floodlight.
content.summary: Large circles of light on ground like spotlight, no aerial source, no ground source, are without electricity at that time, ghostown nearby, wilderness otherwise, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the backyard of my house wagon wheel dr ft. collins, co between 8-9 pm. it was dark except for the city glow. i was facing north and lookup to the ne to see an elongated disk shaped object with pulsating colored lights around the object; reds greens and yellows. it was solid against the city din. there was absolutely no associated noise and i would estimate the elevation at 1500 or less feet. it was not a usual aircraft. it was moving slowly in a south-westernly direction. i watched it for maybe 15-20 secs in absolute amassment. i rushed into the house and told my wife there was a ufo above the backyard and rushed around to get my camera. it seemed forever to locate the camera and when i went outside to take a picture it was gone. the next night on channel 7 (i think) news the denver tv station reported a ufo (maybe several ufo sightings) sighting in boulder. (you can check the exact date by the tv report/maybe denver/boulder paper too i do not know). the"ufo" was moving as i watched it in a direction directly towards boulder, co. i was a student at csu for 8 years. i never reported this but the tv station report the next evening from denver confirmed for me what i had seen in the ft. collins airspace. my times and dates are very approximate.

i was moved to report this from the nbc dateline ufo program last night. one of the segments was similar to what i am reporting that happened nearly 35 years ago.
content.summary: See in ft collins at night later reported seen in boulder same night

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out of my kitchen window which faces south.....Im aware of the flight patterns in my area...Because i live near philadelphia international airport....When all of a sudden i noticed an intense bright ball of white light come from behind my tree outback, the object was lower then tree top level....I grabbed my glassed to get a perfect view of this object....When i looked at it had two white light on either side and a red light on top...None of the lights blinked....The obeject had no wings no propellors...It was a greenish brown metallic color...The closest shape i can compare it to is a hershey's kiss.  it made no noise.  it was so low the object it was roof top level....My home is three stories....Has anyone else seen anything similar?
content.summary: Bright light....Hershey kiss like shape

content.detailedDescription:
I saw this ufo on august the 30th, 2008 at 2:15 in the am cst in st. louis. it appeared to be just a plane with regular lights and such so i wasn't excited about it at first. it was high up like the vapor-trail jets. then several seconds later all of a sudden it changed. from regular blinking lights to one big bright light that resemble like a planet. it was traveling slow and then it transformed again into fading lights which appeared to be fading in and out which seemed like it was flying even higher. when it was further down south a shooting star-like object shot next to it. shooting stars can't control their speeds but this one did. it was going slow and then it hurried up and zoomed off! i'm not sure what that was but i think that the one that transformed was a hybrid ship being built at area 51 with alien technology but flown by humans. this craft made no sound at all and i saw it for a couple minutes. i am now aware to looked at even what appears to be regular earth air vehicles as this really fooled me! did anyone else see this activity at the same time or date i did? let me know!

-----------------------------------------------

previous sighting & information

this happen on august 25th, 2008 around 9:30 pm central time in saint louis. i'm a usual stargazer as i love to look at the sky and admire its beauty in our front yard. i have had ufo experiences previously so i also go outside to see if i can see any activity up in the sky. (please read below for more!). i saw this star-like ufo traveling north west. it was extremely high up. it seemed hundreds if not thousands of feet above the atmosphere. it has no blinking lights as it looked like a star. it was traveling straight and slow and then it slowly disappeared because of the streetlight. when i saw it i was excited and had my eyes on it for most of the time and i knew it wasn't a plane and then with further observing i knew it wasn't any earth vehicle or satellite, it was one of them!

this happen on august 11th, 2008 around 9:30 pm central time in saint louis. i'm a usual stargazer as i love to look at the sky and admire its beauty in our front yard. i have had ufo experiences previously and i also go outside to see if i can see any activity up in the sky. (please read below for more!). i saw this star-like ufo traveling down south. it was extremely high up. it seemed hundreds of feet above the atmosphere. it has no blinking lights as it looked like a planet. it was traveling straight and slow and then it slowly disappeared which appeared the object had cloaked. when i saw it i was excited and had my eyes on it for most of the time and i thought is that a plane and then with further observing i knew it wasn't any earth vehicle or satellite. 

i have had many experiences like this in the past since 2001. i have seen several like this one this year. i seen a ginormous ufo a few weeks prior which appeared to be as big as jupiter traveling north which behaved like the one i saw on the 11th. i have seen these behave different in many ways. i have seen them travel back and forth, and cloak and uncloak like a peek-a-boo or a now you see me, now you don't game. i have recently seen one that was going down east which the entire object was flashing but it was a very slow flashing characteristic. now, i have seen two that were not like these a couple years ago. these were on two separate days. they both were extremely high but had a very unusual red flashing characteristic and the one went into hyperspace or warp speed like you see in the star wars and star trek films. that was incredible to witness! i believe these red ones are man made but has alien technology. i have been wondering so long what these are and who/what might be piloting them. it is a wonderful but creepy feeling that i get when i see these objects because i wonder are they the grays, the insectoids or something that we know absolutely nothing about or all of these different species. by seeing these ufos i know that we are not alone! if anyone has any answers and/or has had these experiences please contact me at capri1981@aol.Com with your information!
content.summary: Transforming hybrid ufo!

content.detailedDescription:
this is something i have been planing for many years i am very proud  with my alien contact with beings from another world it started back in spring of 2008 and i decided one night to do this experiment on myself so i got into a mind frame of focusing all my energy on making contact with the world above me and i did here goes, i started calling to the aliens above , and i fell asleep aroun 5am i usually wake up and i decided to contine in what i was doing i was well aware i was putting all my brain waves and emotions up to the sky now im an occultist of many years scince i was a child ive alwasys beleived in other worldly people and i was still aware i was doing this when i awoke and i said to myself keep doing what you are doing raewyn it will come i can feel it, i rememember it being a clear midnight sky very unusual for this time of year in scotland anyways i was well aware of the moon it was full and then my experience began  i was suddenly in the spaceship but i was being taken on a tour of the ship  they  were not pleased with me whem i asked them what are you doing with me the large grwu alien was not to pleased with me and i was aware theat i must behave myseld and not be to bossy as i usually am anyeay people where bording it like a massive shop  the aliens said to me telepathically that somerfields supermarket is to the right of me i awoke on my right side , they left the 3 of them massive tall grey tith enourmous black eyes and they left.
this was the end or so i thought this next experience i dont know what to make of ti it, now due to all theis i am heavily medicated and on injections twicw a week and i beleive it is all the experience that has donethis to me anyways here goes the next night this is when it really hits off i pray to the aliens to come vist me again the next night and they do so around the same time i awake with this massive light being beeamed down on me and im hanging on to my mattress for dear life i say no you cant take me i have my son in the next room they are trying to beam me up and i say no no , you are not taking me i dont eant to go with you the three of them staredown at mee now im scared they leave nd i dont know what to think i still dont please help me i need answers you are my only hope love raewyn
content.summary: As this is an attempted abduction

content.detailedDescription: On august 31, 2008 at 8:45 pm, i was standing on the front porch smoking a cigarette, facing due south. i seen a bright light through the gaps in the tree canopies that line the road, the road being approximately 60 feet from the front of my house, traveling towards me from a south easterly direction. having served in the u.S. air force for four years and have seen many aircraft flying at 500 feet during excercises, i feel comfortable at estimating the altitude to be approximately 1000-2000 feet. when i first noticed the light i had assumed it to a small propeller aircraft. i realized within 10 seconds or so, the craft was flying slightly faster than you would expect a small aircraft to fly. i was waiting to hear the engine as it came closer. after a brief moment listening and it came closer to be almost overhead, there was absolutely no noise at all. i immediately knew when it cleared the obstructed view of the tree canopies, it was definitely not any kind of "normal" aircraft. i quickly turned to open the front door and told my daughter to come outside and fast. in the way i said it and quickly running out to the front yard, she knew to run to see something. by the time we both looked up, the craft was directly overhead and had a defined outer ring of light with another inner and brighter ring of light. it was also considerably dimmer than it was when i first noticed it.  my best guess in the diameter would be at least twice the diameter of what i would expect for a helicopter's blades to be for the altitude it was at (approximately 100 to 200 feet in diameter). just before we lost sight because of the maple tree to our west, we saw one blip of a small red light that appeared to be on the top part of the craft. when the tree obstructed our view, we ran to the driveway on the opposite side of the tree and looked upward. surprisingly, the craft was very dim and just past a directly overhead direction. the next second, there was no light at all, only the dark silhouette of the perfectly circular craft against the clear night sky and background of stars. as the craft continued north west at it's constant speed and the distance from us increased, we were able to see it had a domed dimension above and below the centerline of the craft. we continued watching for about 10 to 15 seconds until we lost sight of it beyond the tree line that is approximately 150 to 200 yards away and the trees being approximately 60 to 80 feet tall. i turned to my daughter and told her she had just witnessed a once in a lifetime event. we were both in awe of what we had just witnessed.
content.summary: Bright, then changing to no light at all, circular object at approximately 1000-2000 feet traveling westerly at about 30 degrees towards the north.

content.detailedDescription: Here is what my wife and i saw; we were driving from hartford toward springfield, mass. on interstate 91 at approximatly 11:40 pm when my wife and i first spotted a cluster of lights in the sky about a couple of miles ahead of us. we first thought that it could be a helicopter of some kind with many lights under it as it seemed to be stationnary in the sky. but as we were appoaching the sighting, the cluster of lights did not look like anything i've ever seen on a helicopter. it was heading slowly toward the south-west and could not make a good description of it. as we were trying to understand what we had just witnessed, i asked my wife to keep an eye over the trees in case she might spot it again. as i was asking her, i spotted another one near windsor ct. following the same path as the first, from the north-east heading south-west . this time we were getting much closer as we kept on driving. the more i drove, the more we knew we were going to drive right over the craft. as it got closer we knew that this was something we had never seen in our lives. as we were almost over it, we could finally make out the light pattern. it was in a v shape with 6 big round glowing white lights. these big lights did not lit the ground. there was a smaller white light at the front with 3 smaller white blinking lights and a small pulsating red light in the midlle of the craft. it made no noise, as our windows were pulled down because it was a hot and muggy night. it was not going very fast. it must have been about 300 to 500 feet over us. we could not make out the triangle dark craft itself as the 6 lights were overshadowing the structure but could tell it was a solid craft because of the difference between the sky and the flying object. ounce it had past over our car, we pulled over and looked at it until we lost sight of it. we were at approximatly at windsor, connecticut on highway 91 heading toward springfield mass. there were other cars on the highway who also witnessed these crafts. thank you ever so much for your time!
content.summary: Triangle ufo flies over my car while driving on highway 91

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were on our back porch looking at the stars, as i was looking to the north west i saw an object that appeared to be stationary like a star but it seemed to be pulsing.  my son commented that it was sometimes red, sometimes, blue, sometimes white and i concurred.  i then sent him in for binoculars as i continued to observe the object.  after getting the binoculars i focused in and indeed it was flashing red blue and white and it wasn't actually stationary but moving about very fast in a tight area.  kind of looked like the squiggly lines a sparkler or light stick make if you jiggle them around.  the other celestial objects near this thing were not squiggly so it ruled out us making it do that with the binoculars and to be sure we steadied them on a railing and the object continued to move erratically. sometimes it appeared to stop and just change colors then it would start up again.  i called my wife out and my other son and they both confirmed what we were seeing.  we continued to watch it for about 20 mins and then it slowly moved beyond the horizon, sometimes stopping.  all the while it was moving away it was still pulsing and moving about in the zig zaggy jiggly motion.  also in the binoculars the lights sometimes appeared to be spinning around rather than flashing in succession or strobing. we have a small airport in our area and an army helicopter base not far so we frequently see helicopters and other conventional aircraft at night and know what they look like and how they behave.  this thing definitely did not look like anything any of us have ever seen before.  i tried to take a photo but the object was too far away.  truly freaky!!!!
content.summary: Pulsating object, multicolored strobing, moving erratically at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
Day time over head object with an appearance smaller than ���moon���. dark surface with very little reflection. object passed in front of telephone pole at a distance of less than 100 feet. movement was hovering and rocking when moving. witness never lost sight of object. 

mufon investigator went to scene and observed object with binoculars. object was an array of four garbage bags tied together.
content.summary: Black "odd looking" hovering object.

content.detailedDescription: My wife, a friend, and myself were sitting on our back porch enjoying the evening air and sky when my wife gasped and asked, "what's that?"  as she pointed towards a white sphere to the north of us.  it travelled in a linear path south to north, but seemed much larger than a normal satellite crossing the night sky.  it flared out like a light bulb when its given way too much juice, stayed brilliant and the size of a dime held in my hand at arms length, then went back to its original brightness of about the size of a popcorn kernel at arms length then in a few seconds simply disappeared.  the next evening i was outside on my back porch about the same time and noticed the exact same object to the north but flying in a curved fashion start out as a kernel of light, to the dime sized light, then to the kernel again and vanish.  i felt as if i was watching something unusual and debated whether or not to tell about the sighting.
content.summary: A bright sphere flew to the north of us, illuminated like a light bulb given extra juice, then went back to its normal lighting and a few seconds later simply vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
I couldn't sleep so i looked arround the sky. all was normal except the ese sky contained several objects that looked like stars moving. the objects varied from whitish yellow to multiple chromographic flashing objects. the movements appeared random to me.

i'm sure they were quite far away as my binoculars added little or no details to the naked eye shapes which were star-like. the atmosphere was very clear and the view was unobstructed in my area.

i first thought my eyes were playing tricks on me. with time over an hour i could tell the movement was in the objects as the other stars did not move like the objects did.

i have no clue what they were other than ufo's. if you know, i'd like to know. you may email i44300@yahoo.Com 

i plan to observe again tonight.
content.summary: Star-like objects moving in circles and side to side in the ese sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was with two friends talking outside after a meeting. i was just talking about having babies, (one of them is pregnant) and the importance of parents becoming aware when they bring children into the world. i remember getting really adamant saying its not about being perfect parents but about the repair and about caring about the next generation with love and compassion. then i happened to look up. and said "what the heck is that?" it looked like a bullet shooting through the sky but instead of going straight it made wave patterns up and down as it crossed the sky. it must have crossed the entire section i was looking at in about 5 seconds (much too fast for an airplane) and then "puff" it disappeared. the "puff" was important because it almost went out like a match or a light.
content.summary: Wave like pattern bullet

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the 2008 chicago air and water show at lake michigan. it was 16 august and i was at fullerton street about 30 feet from the water. i was watching a navy f/a 18 doing maneuvers. i was using binoculars to watch planes when they went higher or further away.

the f/a 18 did a maneuver that took it vertically straight up in the sky and then it did a stall holding it's position for a short while. as it was going up i used my binoculars to keep track of it. while i was watching it i noticed two objects in the sky above the plane.  they were hovering motionless and i was surprised to see them. the distance from these objects and the f/a 18 was hard to tell but they were not very close. but the pilot of the f/a 18 would have seen them since he was headed right for them but did the stall before getting to close. i would be very surprised if he did not see them.  upon first noticing them i tried to figure out what they were. my binoculars were not strong enough to give me the greatest detail but i could make out what they looked like.

they were probably a few hundred yards apart. the closet thing i can compare them to are the rovers that landed on mars. they resembled the bubble-like structure that shielded the rovers as they landed. there were bubbles, as i will call them, all over the object except the bottom. the bottom was triangular and black. the points on the bottom were rounded. the bubbles were cream colored.  there was no visible sign of a propulsion system that i could see. they stayed in that position for about five minutes maybe a little longer. i would watch them and then look at the f/a 18 as it continued it's maneuvers. i held my binoculars in place as so i wouldn't lose track of them. each time i looked back they were there and hadn't moved. i looked around the crowd to see if anyone else had noticed them but i didn't see anyone who did. as the f/a 18 was ending it's show i watched as it flew away. i still kept my binoculars in the same position but when i looked back this time they were gone. i scanned the sky but could not locate them. i still don't know if anyone else saw them, but there was a video crew there taping and i would not be surprised if they got something on tape. i myself had no camera and i wish i did.
content.summary: Chicago air and water show 2008

content.detailedDescription: Today at approximatley 7:40 me, my brother, and 2 friends were playing basketball outside on the driveway. for some time i had been looking at a redish yellow light that would come and go and was moving slowly across the sky and that sometimes made sudden movements. in my area we are near the buffalo airport so we get commercial planes but nothing special so i thought it may have been a jet. i then proceeded to take out binoculars and to me, my brother, my friends, and eventually my dad realized that what we were seeing was a ufo. it was very quiet but looked huge for how high it mustve been which ive estimated between 50 and 70,000 feet. at first thought i was amazed because i myself always had thought ufos were hoaxes but its one of those things that you need to see for yourself we started going crazy and were really just shocked. the object had fantastic moving capabitlities that allowed it to stop on a dime in midair and perform incredible turns. there were very few clouds yesterday so what happend was eventually it got to high to see but then 20 minutes later it was back again, but only for 5 seconds as at an incredible speed it went over our head completley out of view.
content.summary: Ringish/oval hovered high over neighborhood for 20 minutes then at an incredible speed left

content.detailedDescription:
Itwa my son-in- law/s berthday gathering we heard a jet fly overhead at low altitude headed east over our house.  my youngest son and i ran out of the house onto our deck in the back yard able to briefly see a jet on full afterburner.  i recognized this jet as an f-16 because of the silhouette of the empennage and the diamond pattern in the single jet exhaust and i also know that f-16���s routinely stopover at peterson afb as i have seen them both on the ground and arriving and departing. after the jet flew over the houses both my son and i ran through the house to the front yard where my other son was already there... jumping from excitement at the sight of the jet flying at such low altitude.
then to the east (the direction the jet was flying) i saw a bright light almost venus-like, traveling north about the speed of a private airplane. this light varied in intensity like the flash of an electrical arc��� a welder���s arc, which appeared pure white almost an ice blue color with brief flashes of red, blue and possibly green���almost as a diamond does when light is reflected from it.  it was flying at an altitude of about four fingers held at arms length above the nearby horizon at least a mile and a half away or possibly somwhere in the vicinity of shriever afb wich lies a few miles further.
all of a sudden, it appeared that this ���light��� sensed that the jet was approaching and accelerated to a velocity that bordered on scary.  
never in my life have i ever seen anything accelerate like this object, in fact there was no transition from slow to fast��� one moment it was flying slow and the next moment it was almost too fast to follow with the eye with no acceleration in between. it was as though the fast-forward button had been pushed on a dvd player with the action moving from normal to fast-forward in an instant. the approaching jet banked to the left (north) in pursuit but had no chance whatsoever to catch this object and the object sped off to the north out of my line of vision in less than 5 seconds��� the jet however lingered in my sight for a seemingly longer period of time.
i feared reporting this event when it took place to anyone because of any possible repercussions i.E., government agents; mib���s; military personnel and the like,threatening to make me disappear or whatever if i told my story to anyone. but that evening were there were at least three witnesses on the ground and i know the pilot of the f-16 saw that something was there and since norad in cheyenne mountain is nearby they would have had to have been aware of this object and that it posed somekind of a threat otherwise they would not have scrambled a jet out of pete field to investigate.
content.summary: Jet  in hot persuit.

content.detailedDescription:
I am only bored out of my mind and prefer not to report these matters. i have sleeping problems and wake up 4 times a night to smoke outside.

i see the mufon research program and/or the u.S. government, as i, is all over these events, the only differnce being my witnesses from the ground and fill the blanks in the rest.

my trust and faith and love for medical science, philosophy, religion, history and the truth allows me trust for now to share. no explanation is needed the pyramid light formations and the north star-like southern hemisphere nightly appearance i predict is our blessed mother (our lady of fatima) herself, marian.

i suppose to get too close to the lights you perhaps lost. you lost youre eyesight, not a desire of a skilled pilot i presume.

why is this happening, something personal but i tell you this one thing about these nightly saint charles hauntings.....It all leads to robbery and murder if they let theyre gaurds down in trickery.

think about it, should not our riches be focused on medical research and pesticides instead of military like god power and space travel. 10 billion in jet fuel a day? that figure/deed is indeed incorrect on mufon and the governments part.

i know god and the ships as good as the best. can they walk in a hungry mad lions cage to feed it. fill in the blanks patient endurance will be our salvations except god knows a mans will to survice must be accomplished through his own will to seek the knowledge of eternity with only jelousy or low self esteem and hopelessness standing in his way.

i know our blessed mother is here in saint charles, if we look to the southern hemisphere you will see the brightest ufo in the nights skiess, isis of egypt, marian of israel.

rejoice our sacred heart has arrived. pray master will throw us doggies a bone and fly youre white flags in surrender. could our lords or a common man put a million dollars cash in a poor criminals face without being assaulted and robbed? not likely family protects itself , well good families do.

so the ufos are spending time in illinois, i know theyre remaining intend suicide and human reincarnation. stay out of theyre way, they are going to commit suicide to transcend into humanity.

we are the brightest spot in the depths of the stars and nothing else anywhere is a better option. the extra terrestrials are not our enemies and our lords work will prevail soon.

let us not in conclusion limit the possibilities even to the beliefs in time travel for i have seen strange things. cameras flashes our souls like loading a saved spot on youre video game because youre character died, no worries. watch criss angels show, dont let life let you down and dont let them make you suffer, have a beer and baseball. go cubs.

our lady of fatima has arrived and lives well on a ufo in saint charles. rejoice, rejoice, rejoice.

love family.
content.summary: Slowly drifting multiple lights

content.detailedDescription:
they say that washington is a ufo hotspot and now i can say i saw something.

it was wednesday(16th-04-2008), right before 4:00.  the baxter delivery guy had just arrived to get me my pd dialysis supplies for the month.  i went out to talk to him and then he went into the depths of his truck to pull my supplies.

so i was standing there in the driveway and i happened to look up at the tree in the front yard, to see if any greenery had budded yet.  beyond it, in the sky was a pinprick of light.  now, i'm looking almost due east, it's cloudless, pure blue sky, with the sun behind me (since it was almost 4) as i looked, i noticed more and more points of light.  they seemed to be clustered together in the same general vicinity.  and there were two sets.  some which were bright white and some fainter one which were reddish in color.

so, it's like, this can't be what i think it is.  let's see, satilites? baloons or something?  nope.  they were all moving, slowly, but moving, but in different directions.  satilites follow orbits.  ballons follow wind trajectory.  these were going all over.  planes?  maybe.  but about that time, a commersial plane came into my view, traveling from the se to the nw.  i figured it was an ordinary flight going to sea-tac or vancouver, and it proved that whatever i was seeing was farther distant and considerable higher up.  it could still be planes of some type so i watched for a bit longer.  these two points of light drew side-by-side and then reversed themselves.  that's rather odd.  and then, ah! that one there did a right angel. and then another one did two consequtive right angles to reverse it's course.  nope.  not planes!

as i was standing there watching this, my neck crained to the sky, the stories on coast-to-coast about people seeing leo (low earth orbit) spacebattles came to mind.  well, that's what it reminded me of.  if you think of the opening scene from star wars 3 or some of the battle scenes from battlestar galactica, were you have all those ships grouped together.  each one moving in relationship to the others, but everything confined in this relatively small space in the sky, well, that's what it looked like.  about the time i thought to count the lights, the fainter red ones were gone.  the brighter points of light were 16 in number.  they fadded from view after another minute or so.

total time was under five minutes.  probably closer to 3.  the baxter guy then came out of his truck with the first load of my supplies, right about then, when it was over and they were gone.

i didn't even think to call him.  hey, there's a ufo swarm going on out here.
content.summary: Ufo swarm of white and red dots in the afternoon sky

content.detailedDescription:
We were at my girlfriends, friends wedding , as day grew into night i always had a facination with the night sky i have watched comets  eclipses ,satellites and what not  and i really love looking up to see what i can .
so i had a beer or two and went to have a smoke in the pit an as always i was looking up at the sky nothing unusual at first but i kept smoking my cigarette and kept looking up i had seen what looked like a star moving from direct north to direct south it went though the sky for about 400 miles or so in about 30 seconds when it turned from white yellow to red and vanished not a minute later the same thing happened  to  the left in the sky about 00 miles over and did the same  exact thing  i asked other people there on their in put  and they had said  they had never seen anything like it before and i had never either  i tried to explain it away  but  aircraft we have don't fly that fast and silent  ,i wish i would have took a picture but i never made it that far i was way to mezmorized i hope i get to experience something like that again and have a cam  because i will than have proof and post  the evidence ....Always looking up hope to have some more proof
content.summary: Uknown

content.detailedDescription:
This happens almost every night! ive looked south from my apartment, from ground level and there are balls of light flashing around. they appear to be over the us/mexico border, maybe closer to us. even on nights where there is too much cloud cover to see stars or any other astrological phenomenon. tonight my girlfriend and i saw a huge, triangular object that appeared to be 200-300 yards across at the base. it seemed vaugely clear, with white lights at each tip. it was moving east at a very fast rate. we obverseved it for 10 seconds and then it dissapeared behind the clouds. we just happened to notice it while looking at the usual activity we are lucky to whitness every night.

the balls of light that we see nightly have been occuring for years . ive lived on this street for five years and i would notice them while outside smoking a cigarette, and joke to my friends that i just saw a ufo. then as i began to pay attention, having seen them numerous times, i noticed that they were everywhere! they flash for 1-2 seconds and move at lightning speed. they move horizontally, vertically, diaganolly, every way possible. they manuver too quickly to be aircraft. or at least manned aircraft that we currently have flying. they make abrubt right angle turns at times at speed, which would kill any human in the technology we have available to the public.

they go on from about 10pm until about 5am. with peak activity between 1 and 3am.  ive seen them virtually every night i try to look for them and even gotten as many as 6 of my friends to watch at the same time. it is not an isolated incident, and i dont know why i never bothered reporting it, but tonights gigantic triangle accompaning the balls of light, i thought this was a notable story.

i dont have a camera sensitive enough to capture images of them, and there is too much ambient light to video tape them so i cannot post images, but anyone wanting to contact me from mufon can feel free to do so.
content.summary: Balls of light and a large triangular object

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west bound on golf rd. going to hooters by woodfield mall.
i noticed a  silver disc come into my view. as a point of reference it was about 2 inches higher then the street lights.  it was very very shiny,
a different luster then your typical airplane, thats why i noticed it. it hovered there for about a minute or two the blipped out. like it almost appeared as if it disolved from the outside in really really fast. i was watching it @ the long stop light by golf rd. and the frontage rd to get on 53 heading south.  the sky was very clear with little to no cloud cover. it had no faa lights on it that where visible.  the people in the car next to me (my right) where looking at it also b/c i saw them pointing.
content.summary: Silver disc  appeared, hovered then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
My friend [s. h.] and i were at lake wright patman starting at about 1am 5 nights ago. we were discussing plans for our music project when i noticed what looked like a very bright star. it was about -60 degrees to the bottom left of what i think is the little dipper. at first i ignored it. then it started to move towards the north west at a very slow rate. i told [s. h.] and we watched it for about 3 hours. we noticed that it seemed to have diffrent colors that were pulsating. we then walked to diffrent parts of the lake to try to get a better vantage point. after about 2 hours of watching it, the lights would extinguish and come back on for a few seconds randomly. we watched it do this for two more hours and then we left for our homes. 

the next night and the night after, the object was back. same place, around the same time, and the same consistency. we watched it slowly move in a small figure 8 pattern like the first day but at one point on the 3rd day, we saw what appeared to be a smaller solid white point of light arrive to the bottom of the lights and go up inside it.

on the 4th night (last night) we were at [s. h.]'s house watching tv. i went in the back yard to smoke a cigarette and i saw it again. this time it was in a totally diffrent part of the sky and a little lower. i told [s. h.] and he got his binoculars. through the binoculars we noticed that there were at least 5 if not 6 lights lined up next to eachother horizontaly. one white, blue, red, green, yellow and what appeared to be orange. all of the lights were binking but the colors would change their stations randomly. the span of the row was about 30ft. the object still seemed to move in the figure 8 pattern as before. i called 911 and reported it because i thought that it might be an aircraft that was about to crash. 911 transferred me to the ashdown 911 (because that is where it appeared this time) and they had an officer investigate. im not sure if they saw anything because i did not follow up on it with them. after about 3 hours we decided to drive towards ashdown to see if we could get a better look at it. it started to move away towards the south-east this time and we lost sight of it. [s. h.] and i are not the only persons to have seen this. the fishermen at the lake saw it and the gas station customers and employees saw it too. tonight [s. h.] and i are going out to see if we can see it again, this time we have  a dv 3.1 megapixel camcorder and will attempt to find a random 3rd party to come with us. i'll post the pics and the video if tonights investigation yeilds anything.
content.summary: It was a horizontal row of hovering lights that pulsated in diffrent colors. it moved in a small figure 8 pattern

content.detailedDescription: I was looking to the west after sunset because i had taken some pictures of the sunset then took the camera in and sat it down. since it was so warm that evening i decided to sit on the front pourch and cool down some and looking to the west at about 10-o-clock high i see this fairly big object coming down really fast then all of a sudden it lit up in this long bluish/green color and got bright fo about 15 seconds then just dissapered. i don't think it was going fast enough to burn up as i've seen meteors shoot  by up high and at shallow angles but this was about 10 degrees off being stright down. i know you are probably thinking that it might be fireworks or something like that but i know the difference and this wasen't that.It was close enough that i would have herd the launch in the form of a boom. i look up at the night sky alot not looking for strange things but to look at the stars because i'm a star gaser. i have a telescope which ocassionally use and it's quite powerfull. i can inlarge the moon to 400 times with a filter and see hills and stratta lawers as well as the rugged peaks around the craters. the altitude where i first see it was probably around 2500 feet and dissapered at 7 or 800 feet absoulty no noise what so ever. this is the first time i've ever seen anything like it. i hjave never seen a ufo i couldn't identify as being an air craft or some other type of object such as clouds or baloon's or inversion layers which can cause a mirage. it didn't scare me or anything it got me to thinking that what happened to it?
content.summary: Bluish/green long streamer like copper burning flame, missle like shape

content.detailedDescription:
This happened years ago (1993) when i was ten years old. it was a friday in early to mid september night after dark around 830 pm or so and it was partly cloudy with a full moon. every friday evening my mom and i would go walk around my school i was going to for fun etc. my mom and i were only a few blocks from the home i lived in at the time.

my mom and i were returning from our walk and i was a little bit behinder looking down to the ground and out of nowhere a very bright dark blue light flashed on the ground is such a weird way ( its like the sun light type of light you would see at bottom of a pool with the water moving around kind like electricity with bubbles but a dark royal blue very pretty)the light was one inch or so from touching my shoes and was about three feet wide and six feet long and only shine in front of me nothing else and made no noise. this lasted 5 seconds then i looked up to the sky.

when i looked up to the sky it was partly cloundy, calim, and the moon was out. there happen to be a very large cloud behind me and a clear opening to the sky where i was standing ( i want to note that the clouds were about 25,000 feet up or so and the opening was very large miles wide) so when i looked up i first saw nothing at all.. i looked back down and was trying to figure out what happened. i think at the time i was thinking lightining or something like that. at this point i looked up again and the moment i did this very very very large object came out of the cloud made no noise and took off very fast to the west to luke air force base area. 

the object was massive it covered the whole opening in the sky, i want to say it was about 9-12 aircraft cairries long and about 5-7 wide. it was crazy big.The shape was rectagulr with no wings. the shape looked like it should not have been in the air at all no wings nothing. there were a very large number of lights on it and the back of the object was pure white lights and did not make one sound something of that size, speed, and the light coming off the back should have made a noise of moved the clouds or somthing  that was the second weridest part of this first would be the light on the ground in front of me.

i lost the object behind more clouds, but was heading to luke air force base which was 8 miles from the area i was. after the object was gone i was scared ( i was ten years old at the time) and was very uneasy for the rest of the night plus my eye were burning for a unknown reason. this was what made me a full beleaver of ufos. the one question i want ansewered was why did that ufo shine that weird light in front of me for?, but will most likely never get a answer. the moment saw it i knew i was a ufo. there was no other answer for it....     


i would also like to note in 1997 the phoenix lights were not flares i saw that (who didn't see that)
i clearly saw the lights where connected to each other.. if you have any questions please feel free to contact me. thank you
content.summary: Never seen or heard about an object like the one i saw before ever

content.detailedDescription: Last night about 12:30 a.M. i was putting my dogs outside and saw white lights in the sky like those on the tips of an airplane wings. at first i thought he was going to land but could not think of were. as i was watching i saw it was eradicaly moving around, going up, down, backwards,and forwards. then the white lights turned into a row of white lights. then the lights changed color. red green white an yellow. the sky was clear visibility unlimited not a cloud in the sky. do to the fact the a cold front came through. the reflected off what look like fog or a cloud. then there was a flash of light bigger than the object. then it went up higher as a white light. where it bounced around. it came back down to the same location. i came in the house and woke up my wife to show her, i was looking for my binoculars and glasses. i showed my wife the object that now looked the same as an airplane with landing lights. then it did the same this about three times. on the fourth time it can down horizonal to the earth where i saw a circle of colored lights. inside the ring of colored light was another circle of colored lights. it also had a flash of lightning. i t went back up and bounced around again. when it came down again i got my camera and tried to caught on film which i have not developed. watched it do the same thing about two more times then about 3 am it took off in an easterly direction. made a mark on the porch today i used a compass which made it about 28 degrees of mag north. the reason i watched it for 2 and a half hours is because it fasinated me. i have never seen anything move or act the way it did. it did not fly anyway a normal plane or helicopter would fly.
content.summary: Ufo sigting

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i saw this sphere two times while sitting on our deck tonight at about 6:45pm. the second time we saw it i grabbed my camcorder and shot this video. you will see the ufo come into frame after you see the commercial airliner come into view. i followed it as long as i could before i lost it. the ufo took the same flight path as it did the 1st time. we were looking straight south from our deck and the ufo is seen heading in a north-east direction and then seems to stop and climb out of our sight. this happened both times and there was no sound. we thought it could have been a dark colored balloon but, thought it was odd that we saw one and then another one 10 minutes later taking the same flight path. maybe you can help. there is little to no wind tonight also. no wind was visible at the treetops.
content.summary: Dark colored sphere spotted 2 times from my deck

content.detailedDescription: I was up for coffee and happend to look out our living room window and i saw a flasing light comming down from the south.  it came to about 150ft away from my house and about 50-60ft above the water {we live on a lake}it came in fast but as it slowed down at that hight it slowed to a crawl of about 4-5mph.  it had 3 lights on the bottom of it 2 on the outside were yellow/white and the one in the middle that was bigger was gold /white and blinked as i was watching it i saw the reflection of the main light on the waters surface nad i kinda got a little scared at that point it slowly went west untill out of viewat the same slow speed and height.  it didnt make a sound at first i thought it was a helocopter but it didnt make a sound and at that distance i woulld have heard somthing.  tonite im going to get my camera and see if it comes back. to me it seemed to be looking for somthig but who knows.  tx for your service daniel paiement.
content.summary: Well it came from the south down to about 50ft above our lake all can see was 3 lights 2 continuous the larger middle one flashing

content.detailedDescription:
July  4th 2006  at  10:40 pm

it  had  rained  july 4th 2006  and  the  rangers  baseball  game  had 
been  delayed  almost  2  hours.  they  wanted  to  finish  the  game 
before  the  fireworks  display,  so  we  had  a 2 hour  wait.

the  sky,  "ceiling",  was  very  low and  the  clouds  were  snow-white,
except  for  a  large  round  hole,  just  above  me.

the  clouds  were  so  low  ,  that  the  lights  from  ranger stadium
reflected  off  the  clouds  as  almost  daylight.

i  was  lying  on  my   back  on  the  parking  lot  of  "wet & wild
water park",  watching  md80"s  depart  from  the  west side  of 
dfw  in  a  heading  north  to  south.  they  would  turn  west  for 
the  planes  going  west.  they  would  turn  west right about  the  
north  side  of  i30.  they  would  fly  very  close  or  under  the 
"open  hole" above  me,  then  they would  shortly  dissapear  into 
the  low  clouds.

i  am  a  long-time  pilot  and  i  still  love  to  watch  aircraft.
this  story  has  never  been  reported  to  officials  or to the  press.

md 80's  have  an approximate  wingspan  of  120  feet,  this  length 
became  important  a  short time  later.

after  the departures  slowed  down  at  dfw,  i  continued  to  look 
through  the  large open  hole   because   i  noticed  that  i  could  only see  one  star.

to  my  dismay , at  approximately  10:40 pm  (4)  "disk-shaped, flying
saucers  in  an  oblique  formation  flew  directly  through  the 
large  open  hole.  i  was  in  a  large  crowd  of  people  and 
i  didn't  want  to  be  accused  of  yelling  " fire in  a  theater".
they  were  flying   a  pattern  where-as, "they  all" could   fly
at  any   direction  in  a  moment  of danger.

the  ships  were   pewter  and  bronze mixture  and  were  the smothest
metal  that  i  have  ever  seen.

i  could  only  view  the  bottoms  of  these   craft.
they  had  no  lights  on  and  noiseless,  no visible propulsion system.
they  were  traveling  at  approimately  350 miles per  hour.

the  "lead  on"  craft  had  a  lower  conning  tower.  all the  other 
3  were  identical---  smooth  bottoms. all   the  craft  were  
approximatly  60  feet  in   diameter.

they  were  flying  due  east  directly  opposite  the  md 80's
departure route  west  route, at  approximatly  10  to  20 feet  above
the  cloud  cover,  only  about  100  ft.  above  the md 80's 
departure  trek.

the faa would call  this  very  illegal  and  it  could  have  caused  a  mid-air collision--   but,  it  didn't.

two  days  later,  i  had  a very  scarey   visit  with  another  
ufo  right above  my   head ,  but  hundreds  of   feet up ,  there  is
a  witness   to  this  event. 

we  were  standing  at  the  back  of  marvin's  pick-up truck  and 
i  was  looking   up  into  a  clear  sky   and  i   see   a  red-light
moving   at  an  astronomical  speed  accross  the  sky  about  10  degrees  off  of  my  normal  angle.

i  said ,  "marvin  look  at  that  light  and  pointed  to  it and 
marvin  saw  it. 
when  i  said  that",  it  stopped  on  a dime" ,  and  began  billowing
a  bright  blue  and  yellow  beam  to  the  earth,  just  like  "startrec".

i  told  marvin,  they  may  be  coming  after  me because i  
observed  then  a  few  days  ago". "we  need  to  hide  or  run". when  i  said  that ,  the beam
zoomed  back  to  the  craft  and  it exited  faster  than  the 
speed  of  light,  it  shot  off   and  dissapered  before   our  eyes. 

i  think  these  craft  can  hear  us  speak.

                                            b. smith
content.summary: Pilot  sees  (4)  flying  saucers  in   an  oblique  formation  flying  the  opposite   direction  in   a   dfw   highly  restricted   west   departure  zone.

content.detailedDescription:
I first got into ufo's through watching various footage on the internet site youtube.  one night i watched the 2005 ufo conference with jaime mussan and became very intrigued by the information given about ufo capture in infared, and decided to purchase a camcorder.  after of summer of trying out various filters and lenses, the latest addition, a 1000nm infrared filter (which i was using for the first time), combined with uv filter 0.45x wide angle lens tele convertor 2.0x lens, i happened to make my catch. i was in the garden generally filming the sky trying out various sun positions and filming techniques. after 30minutes or so watching the sky filming this and that, i decided to watch the footage that i had captured, on my laptop. 

when watching the footage that i had recorded, i suddenly saw somthing that i had previously looked over in the garden. upon seeing the object on my computer screen, i then realised that i had caught somthing rather special.  my initial reaction when seeing this anomoly, was almost a sense of disbelief. then the satisfaction of actually catching it on film set in.

after several veiwings of the said footage, i felt a feeling of unease and a little unsettled because i was unsure whether the i was watching the object, or, the object was watching me! 

i would estimate the object being no more than 50-80ft above the roof-tops of the neighbouring houses. the object appeared as a fairly round ball of light, with no hard edges, approximatly 6-10ft in diameter. as you can see from the footage, it hovered for several seconds before excelerating at a very high speed upwards into the sky, before disappearing out of sight.
content.summary: Filming the skies in infrared when caught ufo above neighbours house

content.detailedDescription: Hokkaido japan @ a radar site on that island.  i went up to the radar dome to just observe. i was a medic and could move freely on the site. i think art waqs also an air force medic? a guy writting backwords on a plastic board. bogies would pop co north of hokkaido and they were placed on the plastic board.  planes were sent up to engage and the bogies would return to sackland?  one popped up and suddenly went sraight up at an estimated six thousand mph.  a machine called a high finder only went to 95 mi. or 95 thousand feet.  the next morning at the mess hall i started talking about the incident, boy did they stop me from talking immediately. the radar people was de breafed after i had left and was warned not to talk about the incident. it has been on my mind a lot since then. thanks, bill
content.summary: Radar  indicated the object went up @ app. 6000 mph.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the chicago jazzfest, laying down in the grass around 8:15 or so.  i look up at the sky and it was dusky but about 15-20 min from being nighttime so it was a wierd dark purplish-red color.  i hadn't had any alcohol in over a week and no illegal substances in months if not years.  i look up at the sky and see what appears to be a plane moving in a north/northwesternly direction at a moderate speed. i gain some perspective by focusing more and realize that if this was a plane it would be ridiculously high in the air based on how i was unable to make out a shape and could only see the lights from the bottom (white-ish).  also the light kinda flickered a little but i wasnt sure if it was just clouds passing between the object and my field of sight or not.  i follow the plane as it moves across the sky thinking to myself i thought planes always had colored lights on the bottom but dismissed it.  i kept thinking, man this plane is really far up there i wonder why.  i had been watching the plane for maybe 5-10 min when i saw another passenger jumbo jet presumably coming from o'hare airport.  this plane looked normal and to be of a normal flying altitude.  as it got closer to the "plane" i had been watching i noticed that the altitude of the "plane" i was originally watching had to be at least 2.5x greater.  at this point i noticed that the "plane" also came to a complete halt.  i called it to the attention of my friend that i came with and she watched along too.  as the commercial plane flew under and past this "plane" began moving again in the same direction.  now i was concerned b/c i know that there are super high altitude planes but i dont think we have the technology yet to reach such high altitudes and also come to a complete stop and hover there.  anyway i started to focus all my attention on this one object.  from the time the "plane/star" started moving again, it took roughly 2-3 seconds for it to get back up to its original velocity.  second point of interest b/c i also dont think we have the technology to go from what appears to be standstill to say...Mach2 in that short a time.  so i'm still watching the "plane/star" thing when i saw it bust a 90 turn and head what would appear to be either south completely east or just down closer to earth.  now i'm super concerned b/c a plane moving at that speed should not have that type of agility.  from there i watched go through a series of complete stops to mad 5 second dashes with other 90turns mixed in.  at this point me and the other witness were completely convinced this was more of a ufo than some governmental experimental aircraft.  so at this point i had been watching the ufo for at least 35-40 minutes, and it was now completely dark in the sky so other stars were out.  i had only been focused on this one "star/ufo" thing the whole time so had not paid any attention to anything else in the sky save the one commercial plane that flew by.  so now for contrast i looked at some of the other stars and my friend commented that it looked like some of the other ones were moving too.  so now i chose a few stars closer to the original one i had been watching so as not to lose it, and noticed that indeed they were.  the other stars i focused on were considerably less dim and presumably further up in the sky.  however they were also coming to these start/stop/mad dash type of movements as well, however i didnt look at any of the others to see them do the 90 turns.  now i'm really worried because i'm starting to think this is an invasion or some super alien reconnaissance mission.  i figured if it were experimental aircraft there's no way in hell the gov't could siphon away that much money to secretly build that many super advanced aircraft as there were at least 10-15 erratically moving objects in the sky.  the original one i was watching remained the brightest and presumably the most close to me.  i was concerned about them initiating an attack or beaming me up or something but i wanted to verify if this was something that was out of our atmosphere or just appeared to be first.  so i called my friend in puerto rico and asked him to go outside and look at the stars to tell me if his were moving as well.  he did, i waited and sure enough he said no they werent.  he looked around for a bit and preceded to tell me about what happened to him the night before.  but i got off the phone because i was more interested in the stars moving around all crazy where i was.  the fact that he couldnt see them told me that they werent all the way out of the atmosphere or else they should be visible from pr as well, but they were indeed much closer to chicago.  so then i decided we should leave just in case something happened and we then left after about a 1.5 hrs of watching and the original brightest ufo was still sitting up in the sky, at that point it was at a standstill.  i have a witness so i know i'm not crazy.  
points i would like to make:
1. high altitude planes must maintain a certain speed to remain at altitudes of that magnitude, that's a fact.  no helicopter could possibly be like 50,ooo ft off the ground.
2. high altitude planes are quick and nimble to a degree, but not 90 degree turn nimble.  i think of a plane with super agility and i think of like an su-27 or something but even that can not make turns of that nature at super high altitudes like that, and especially hover at them.
3. a jet engine plane can have amazing acceleration, but going from a standstill to some ridiculous speed in under 3 seconds is not possible, especially with whatever friction it would experience at a height of that magnitude.
4. i watched the original "plane/ufo" for over an hour.  to reach super high altitude requires an ordinate amount of fuel, i imagine planes of that nature would have to make their trip and then hurriedly come back to be refueled.  to fit the amount of fuel it would take to be lolly-gagging around in subspace for over an hour on a plane aerodynamically equipped to make such agile turns would require a fuel tank probably bigger than the plane itself, unless there is some alternate energy source the gov't has that they are hiding from us.
5. were this to be erratic movements of just stars or something else out of this atmosphere, then it should be visible to people in other places. granted i only called one person in pr but he probably would've seen something as many objects were moving around all crazy from where i was looking up.
6. if these were a bunch of experimental gov't crafts then uncle sam is pilfering an absurd amount of money from taxpayers and somebody somewhere should be fired if they havent noticed the national budget misappropriating 500 bil or whatever it would take to come up with the r & d to make something that performs like this and also make a bunch of them
7. i have an unnamed witness and i've told multiple people already so if this were some gov't conspiracy and i basically just told on myself throught this website then the government will have to "quiet" alot of people in the near future besides just me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like object moving across sky very erratically, then others later
